AzureBlade: I... am not totally sure. It seems something exploded in 
the CR Chambers. My body was destroyed, but my spark survived. With 
Alpha's help, I was able to find a new physical enveloppe. But Prowl, 
before I came to fight in the battle against the Decepticons, I went 
to the Predacon base. I found something very very interesting...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Prowl::
> 
> "So I see. What happaned?"
